title: The Remains Which Live by Keisuke Asaba
author: Keisuke Asaba
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: The Remains Which Live by Keisuke Asaba
text:
Skip to content
Issue 39 – December 2009Cover ArtThe Remains Which LiveKeisuke is a Tokyo-based Japanese artist that works in acrylic paints, watercolors, and Photoshop. He enjoys and has been influenced by 2D and 3D animated films. He wants to "draw the world that can only be expressed in 2D."

 
 ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
